Title: The Road: Part 2
Writer: Steven Wright (story by), Louis C.K. (created by), Louis C.K. (story), Louis C.K. (teleplay)
Actors: Louis C.K., Ursula Parker, Jim Florentine, Zandi Holup
Plot: Louie's road trip continues in Oklahoma City, where's he's stuck sharing a condo with an crude, obnoxious opening act who tells a bunch of fart jokes.
